Heya pal, glad you're here! I'm Zinzy, and this is my personal website. I come here to share soft stances, lived experiences, and critical notes on the things I hold dear.

Read my diary

  • Showing up not knowing what will happen

    Saturday, April 1, 2023

    I got to meet one of my Internet heroes this week: Patrick Rhone and his family were on a Europe trip, and I was lucky enough to catch the planning stage on his blog right in time to extend an invitation.

  • Week 11: Meeting Patrick

    Sunday, March 26, 2023

    I got to meet one of my Internet heroes this week: Patrick Rhone and his family were on a Europe trip, and I was lucky enough to catch the planning stage on his blog right in time to extend an invitation.
